Void Linux

Pros

  • Rolling release1).
  • Native non-systemd init system (runit).
  • Independent distribution.
  • Text mode installation.
  • Binary based.
  • Package manager (XBPS).
  • Wide processor architecture support (amd64, i686, aarch64, armv7, armv6).
  • Stable.
  • Separates free and non-free software2).
  • Multiple C libraries support (glibc, musl).

Cons

  • Small community & amount of packages3).
  • Multiple kernel versions (not only 1 kernel name for each kernel type).
1)
Versions of various linux distributions: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comparison_of_Linux_distributions#General
2)
Void repositories: https://docs.voidlinux.org/xbps/repositories.
3)
Void packages: https://voidlinux.org/packages.
